parameters.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Agent Dispatcher v3 — simplified: /clear + tmux send-keys
# No kill/restart dance. If agent is idle, /clear and send work.

git config --global --add safe.directory '*' 2>/dev/null

# ── Helper: check if agent is idle via tmux ──
check_idle() {
  local NAME="$1"
  local OUTPUT
  OUTPUT=$(tmux capture-pane -p -t "$NAME" 2>/dev/null) || { echo "no_session"; return; }
  local LAST
  LAST=$(echo "$OUTPUT" | grep -v '^\s*$' | tail -1)
  [ -z "$LAST" ] && { echo "idle"; return; }
  echo "$LAST" | grep -qE '❯|^> *$' && echo "idle" || echo "busy"
}

# ── Helper: send text to agent via tmux (temp file avoids all quoting issues) ──
send_to_agent() {
  local NAME="$1"
  local TEXT="$2"
  local TMP="/tmp/.dispatch-msg-$$"
  printf '%s' "$TEXT" > "$TMP"
  chmod 644 "$TMP"
  su - agent -c "tmux load-buffer '$TMP' && tmux paste-buffer -t '$NAME' -d && tmux send-keys -t '$NAME' Enter" 2>/dev/null
  rm -f "$TMP"
}

# ── Helper: get agent's current working directory from AI Maestro ──
get_agent_workdir() {
  local AGENT_ID="$1"
  curl -s "http://localhost:23001/api/agents/$AGENT_ID" | python3 -c "import sys,json; print(json.load(sys.stdin).get('workingDirectory',''))" 2>/dev/null
}

# ── Section 1: Check active jobs for completion ──
for AGENT_DIR in /data/queue/boswell-hub-manager /data/queue/boswell-app-manager; do
  export AGENT_NAME=$(basename "$AGENT_DIR")
  export ACTIVE_FILE="$AGENT_DIR/.active"
  [ ! -f "$ACTIVE_FILE" ] && continue

  # Skip completion check if job started less than 2 minutes ago
  AGE_OK=$(python3 -c "
import json, os
from datetime import datetime, timezone
a = json.load(open(os.environ['ACTIVE_FILE']))
s = datetime.fromisoformat(a['started_at'].replace('Z', '+00:00'))
print('yes' if (datetime.now(timezone.utc) - s).total_seconds() > 120 else 'no')
")
  if [ "$AGE_OK" = "no" ]; then
    echo "WAIT: $AGENT_NAME job too recent, skipping completion check"
    continue
  fi

  STATUS=$(check_idle "$AGENT_NAME")

  if [ "$STATUS" = "idle" ] || [ "$STATUS" = "no_session" ]; then
    # Agent finished — post completion comment, remove .active
    # DO NOT kill the session. Leave it idle for fast re-dispatch.
    python3 << 'PYEOF'
import json, urllib.request, os
from datetime import datetime, timezone

active = json.load(open(os.environ['ACTIVE_FILE']))
now = datetime.now(timezone.utc)
start = datetime.fromisoformat(active['started_at'].replace('Z', '+00:00'))
dur = int((now - start).total_seconds() / 60)

body = "\n".join([
    f"\U0001f916 **{os.environ['AGENT_NAME']}** finished working on this issue.",
    "",
    f"**Task:** {active['action']} \u00b7 **Issue:** #{active['issue_number']}",
    f"**Started:** {start.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M UTC')}",
    f"**Completed:** {now.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M UTC')} \u00b7 Duration: {dur}m",
    "**Status:** \u2705 Complete",
])

data = json.dumps({"body": body}).encode()
req = urllib.request.Request(
    f"https://api.github.com/repos/{active['repo']}/issues/comments/{active['comment_id']}",
    data=data, method='PATCH',
    headers={
        'Authorization': f"token {os.environ.get('GH_TOKEN', '')}",
        'Accept': 'application/vnd.github+json',
        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    }
)
try:
    urllib.request.urlopen(req)
    os.remove(os.environ['ACTIVE_FILE'])
    print(f"COMPLETE: {os.environ['AGENT_NAME']} #{active['issue_number']} ({active['action']}) - {dur}m")
except Exception as e:
    print(f"ERROR updating comment: {e}")
PYEOF

  elif [ "$STATUS" = "busy" ]; then
    # Check if stuck (>2h)
    export ACTIVE_FILE AGENT_NAME
    python3 << 'PYEOF'
import json, urllib.request, os
from datetime import datetime, timezone

active = json.load(open(os.environ['ACTIVE_FILE']))
start = datetime.fromisoformat(active['started_at'].replace('Z', '+00:00'))
elapsed = (datetime.now(timezone.utc) - start).total_seconds()

if elapsed > 7200:
    body = "\n".join([
        f"\U0001f916 **{os.environ['AGENT_NAME']}** is working on this issue.",
        "",
        f"**Task:** {active['action']} \u00b7 **Issue:** #{active['issue_number']}",
        f"**Started:** {start.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M UTC')}",
        f"**Status:** \u26a0\ufe0f Agent may be stuck (>{int(elapsed/3600)}h)",
    ])
    data = json.dumps({"body": body}).encode()
    req = urllib.request.Request(
        f"https://api.github.com/repos/{active['repo']}/issues/comments/{active['comment_id']}",
        data=data, method='PATCH',
        headers={
            'Authorization': f"token {os.environ.get('GH_TOKEN', '')}",
            'Accept': 'application/vnd.github+json',
            'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        }
    )
    try:
        urllib.request.urlopen(req)
        print(f"WARN: {os.environ['AGENT_NAME']} stuck (>{int(elapsed/3600)}h)")
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"ERROR: {e}")
PYEOF
  fi
done

# ── Section 2: Dispatch new jobs ──
for AGENT_DIR in /data/queue/boswell-hub-manager /data/queue/boswell-app-manager; do
  AGENT_NAME=$(basename "$AGENT_DIR")
  ACTIVE_FILE="$AGENT_DIR/.active"

  # Skip if agent has active work
  [ -f "$ACTIVE_FILE" ] && continue

  # Get oldest job file (timestamp prefix = FIFO)
  OLDEST=$(ls -1 "$AGENT_DIR"/ 2>/dev/null | grep -v '^\.' | sort | head -1)
  [ -z "$OLDEST" ] && continue

  # Read job file
  JOB=$(cat "$AGENT_DIR/$OLDEST")
  MESSAGE=$(echo "$JOB" | python3 -c "import sys,json; print(json.load(sys.stdin)['message'])")
  ISSUE_NUM=$(echo "$JOB" | python3 -c "import sys,json; print(json.load(sys.stdin)['issue_number'])")
  NEEDS_WT=$(echo "$JOB" | python3 -c "import sys,json; print(json.load(sys.stdin)['needs_worktree'])")
  JOB_REPO=$(echo "$JOB" | python3 -c "import sys,json; print(json.load(sys.stdin)['repo'])")
  JOB_ACTION=$(echo "$JOB" | python3 -c "import sys,json; print(json.load(sys.stdin)['action'])")

  AGENT_ROOT="/data/agents/$AGENT_NAME"
  REPO="$AGENT_ROOT/repo"
  WT_PATH="$AGENT_ROOT/issues/issue-$ISSUE_NUM"

  # Freshness: always fetch before dispatch
  git -C "$REPO" fetch origin 2>&1 || echo "WARN: git fetch failed for $AGENT_NAME"

  # Issue workspace setup (local clone per issue)
  if [ "$NEEDS_WT" = "True" ] || [ "$NEEDS_WT" = "true" ]; then
    if [ ! -d "$WT_PATH" ]; then
      GITHUB_URL=$(git -C "$REPO" remote get-url origin)
      CLONE_OUT=$(git clone "$REPO" "$WT_PATH" 2>&1)
      CLONE_RC=$?
      if [ $CLONE_RC -ne 0 ]; then
        echo "ERROR: clone failed for $AGENT_NAME issue-$ISSUE_NUM: $CLONE_OUT"
        continue
      fi
      git -C "$WT_PATH" remote set-url origin "$GITHUB_URL"
      git -C "$WT_PATH" checkout "issue/$ISSUE_NUM/work" 2>/dev/null || \
        git -C "$WT_PATH" checkout -b "issue/$ISSUE_NUM/work" origin/main 2>&1
      rm -rf "$WT_PATH/.claude/work" 2>/dev/null
      git -C "$WT_PATH" config --local gh.default-repo "$JOB_REPO" 2>/dev/null
      su - agent -c "cd '$WT_PATH' && gh repo set-default '$JOB_REPO'" 2>/dev/null || true
      cat >> "$WT_PATH/CLAUDE.md" << 'GUARDRAILS'

## Agent Guardrails (auto-injected by dispatcher)

- **NEVER merge pull requests.** Only create PRs and leave them for human review.
- **NEVER close or resolve issues.** Only reference them in PR descriptions.
- **This repository is: REPO_PLACEHOLDER.** Always use `--repo REPO_PLACEHOLDER` with gh CLI commands, or omit --repo to use the configured default.
GUARDRAILS
      sed -i "s|REPO_PLACEHOLDER|$JOB_REPO|g" "$WT_PATH/CLAUDE.md"
      chown -R agent:agent "$WT_PATH"
    fi
    WORK_DIR="$WT_PATH"
  elif [ "$NEEDS_WT" = "if_exists" ] && [ -d "$WT_PATH" ]; then
    WORK_DIR="$WT_PATH"
  else
    git -C "$REPO" pull origin main 2>&1 || true
    WORK_DIR="$REPO"
  fi

  # Get agent ID from AI Maestro registry
  AGENT_ID=$(python3 -c "
import json
with open('/data/ai-maestro/agents/registry.json') as f:
    agents = json.load(f)
for a in agents:
    if a['name'] == '$AGENT_NAME':
        print(a['id'])
        break
")

  if [ -z "$AGENT_ID" ]; then
    echo "ERROR: No agent ID found for $AGENT_NAME"
    continue
  fi

  # ── Dispatch: check session state and send work ──
  SESSION_STATUS=$(check_idle "$AGENT_NAME")
  CURRENT_DIR=$(get_agent_workdir "$AGENT_ID")
  NEED_RESTART=false

  if [ "$SESSION_STATUS" = "busy" ]; then
    echo "SKIP: $AGENT_NAME busy, will retry next cycle"
    continue
  fi

  if [ "$SESSION_STATUS" = "idle" ]; then
    # Agent is running and idle — check if working directory matches
    if [ "$CURRENT_DIR" = "$WORK_DIR" ]; then
      # Same directory: /clear and send command. Fast path.
      echo "FAST: $AGENT_NAME idle, same dir — /clear + send"
      send_to_agent "$AGENT_NAME" "/clear"
      sleep 5
      send_to_agent "$AGENT_NAME" "$MESSAGE"
    else
      # Different directory: need to restart with new CWD
      echo "RESTART: $AGENT_NAME idle but dir changed ($CURRENT_DIR → $WORK_DIR)"
      NEED_RESTART=true
      su - agent -c "tmux kill-session -t '$AGENT_NAME'" 2>/dev/null || true
      sleep 2
    fi
  else
    # No session at all
    NEED_RESTART=true
  fi

  if [ "$NEED_RESTART" = "true" ]; then
    # Set working directory, wake, wait for idle, send command
    curl -s -X PATCH "http://localhost:23001/api/agents/$AGENT_ID" \
      -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
      -d "{\"workingDirectory\": \"$WORK_DIR\"}" > /dev/null
    curl -s -X POST "http://localhost:23001/api/agents/$AGENT_ID/wake" > /dev/null
    echo "WAKE: $AGENT_NAME — waiting 35s for idle..."
    sleep 35
    # Send command directly via tmux (bypass flaky API idle check)
    send_to_agent "$AGENT_NAME" "$MESSAGE"
  fi

  # Remove job from queue
  rm "$AGENT_DIR/$OLDEST"

  # Post start comment on GitHub + write .active file
  export AGENT_NAME ISSUE_NUM JOB_REPO JOB_ACTION ACTIVE_FILE
  python3 << 'PYEOF'
import json, urllib.request, os
from datetime import datetime, timezone

now = datetime.now(timezone.utc)
now_str = now.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M UTC')
agent = os.environ['AGENT_NAME']
issue = os.environ['ISSUE_NUM']
repo = os.environ['JOB_REPO']
action = os.environ['JOB_ACTION']

body = "\n".join([
    f"\U0001f916 **{agent}** is working on this issue.",
    "",
    f"**Task:** {action} \u00b7 **Issue:** #{issue}",
    f"**Started:** {now_str}",
    "**Status:** \u23f3 In progress...",
])

data = json.dumps({"body": body}).encode()
req = urllib.request.Request(
    f"https://api.github.com/repos/{repo}/issues/{issue}/comments",
    data=data, method='POST',
    headers={
        'Authorization': f"token {os.environ.get('GH_TOKEN', '')}",
        'Accept': 'application/vnd.github+json',
        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    }
)
try:
    resp = urllib.request.urlopen(req)
    comment = json.loads(resp.read())
    comment_id = comment['id']

    active_data = {
        'comment_id': comment_id,
        'issue_number': int(issue),
        'repo': repo,
        'action': action,
        'started_at': now.isoformat().replace('+00:00', 'Z'),
    }
    with open(os.environ['ACTIVE_FILE'], 'w') as f:
        json.dump(active_data, f)

    print(f"STARTED: {agent} #{issue} ({action}) - comment {comment_id}")
except Exception as e:
    print(f"ERROR posting start comment: {e}")
PYEOF

  echo "OK: Dispatched to $AGENT_NAME (issue #$ISSUE_NUM, dir=$WORK_DIR): $(echo "$MESSAGE" | head -c 100)"
done
